channel.title: Getting-starteds on Martian
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on Martian

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installing Martian Official binary distributions of the Martian toolchain are available for Linux, macOS and Windows: Download OS Arch SHA256 martian-v2.3.0-rc1-linux-x86_64.tar.gz Linux x86-64 2d81806d4ccaef15b5513fd096c1ae6aafc387bf480f299d1aaa0819b0327572 Coming soon macOS x86-64 Please contribute! Windows x86-64 Building from Source Prerequisites Go 1.8 or higher is required to build Martian. The Python adapter for wrapping stage code requires Python 2.
